mapper.insert: insert into consumer ( ip, name, consumer_group_names, sdk_version, lan, heart_time )values( #{ip}, #{name}, #{consumerGroupNames}, #{sdkVersion}, #{lan}, current_timestamp )
mapper.select: select * from consumer where heart_time < TIMESTAMPADD(second, -#{heartTimeInterval}, current_timestamp )
select * from consumer where id in (select consumer_id from consumer_group_consumer where consumer_group_id=#{consumerGroupId}) limit 1
